## Installation

* Install the development version from GitHub:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("mcanouil/eggla")
```

* Install a particular version:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("mcanouil/eggla@v0.4.4")
```
